comments:
I20051206-1200

- open Java Stack Trace Console
- select all
- paste this trace:
Caused by: java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index: 0, Size: 0
        at
java.util.ArrayList.RangeCheck(ArrayList.java:547)
        at
java.util.ArrayList.get(ArrayList.java:322)

- click on the link ArrayList.java:547

=> A dialog appears, saying "Source not found for ava.util.ArrayList". It works when I insert a space character at the beginning of the line.

Created an attachment (id=31429)
Removes unnecessary test

the test for the beginning of the debug line being missing was being applied twice. This should fix it. Note: my VM is acting a bit flaky, but this should solve the posted issue.

Created an attachment (id=31471)
Fixes non-removal of line number  from type name, and cropped 1st letter

The previous patch only fixed the issue with regards to a less recent batch of code. Since that point, the code change, which added an extra bug to this. 
This patch works, removing the cropped 1st letter, as well as the new issue of not removing the line number from the type name. ;)
